amendment.description: To modify the automatic residential garage door operators standards requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4141 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1696) To modify the automatic residential garage door operators standards requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4141 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Durbin.
